short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A persistent daily planner that syncs across devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Planner - Sync Your Tasks Across All Devices

Streamline your daily planning with our intuitive Chrome extension that syncs seamlessly across all your devices.

Features:
• Create and manage daily tasks with time slots
• Automatic sync across all your Chrome browsers
• Clean, user-friendly interface
• Task completion tracking
• Date-based organization
• Persistent storage
• No external servers - your data stays in your Google account

Perfect for:
• Professionals managing daily schedules
• Students organizing assignments
• Anyone wanting to boost productivity

Your tasks sync automatically with your Google account, ensuring you never lose your planning data.

Version: 1.0
Price: $1.99
